charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking through
town when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Geeta shopping.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1101_020:
She and her Glimmora seemed to be peering into
a store.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_040:
I’ve been wandering from store to store, searching
for precious stones.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_050:
I suppose it’s no surprise that Pasio has a wide
selection of jewels I’ve never seen before.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_060:
Look, Glimmora—those stones may not be what
we’re looking for, but they look very similar, don’t
you think?
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0301_070:
Is there a connection between
Glimmora and jewels?
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0401_080:
Very perceptive—especially considering I haven’t
explained anything yet...
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0302_090: Don’t they look a bit like Glimmora?
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0402_100:
Oh, that caught your attention? Very perceptive,
I see.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_110: Do you know the secret of Glimmora’s petals?
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_120:
They may look like flower petals, but they’re
actually crystallized poison energy.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_130:
And the shine of Terastallization also resembles
Glimmora’s petals...
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_140:
Terastallization is a mysterious phenomenon that
causes Pokémon to sparkle and shine.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_150:
As I’ve pursued these mysteries, I’ve also become
interested in all kinds of different jewels.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0401_170:
Indeed. I hope I can learn more from battling
together as a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0302_180: You’re full of mysteries too, Geeta!
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0402_190:
I’m just a Trainer who finds fulfillment in seeking
out rare young talent.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_200:
The common thread connecting the mysteries of
both Glimmora and Terastallization is crystals...
Or stones, to be specific.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_210:
I’d be much obliged if a specialist in this subject
could lend me their knowledge.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_220:
Do you know of anyone who is knowledgeable
about stones, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_230: Hmm... Steven, you say? Ah, yes, from Hoenn...
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_240:
Another region’s Champion... Here on Pasio, we
can not only talk to each other—we can battle
each other, too.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_250: Thank you. I believe I’ll pay him a visit later.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_260:
After all, on Pasio we have the privilege of
challenging the strongest, most famous opponents
with no need to hold back.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_270:
...Speaking of which, I see in your eyes an
overwhelming desire to battle.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_280: And it seems Glimmora senses it, too.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_290:
What do you say? Shall we have ourselves
a battle?
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_0401_310: Yes, my heart is dancing, too.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_340:
But before we begin...there’s one thing I must
tell you.
charaepi_ch0295_00_omodaka/2301_1201_350:
I am utterly incapable of holding back when it
comes to Pokémon battles.
